name: Power Within
description:
A puzzle platformer where you must use your acrobatic skills to navigate compact, dangerous dungeons. Can you make it to the end of all eight rooms with a perfect record? 

Controls

Move: A & D or Left & Right Arrows
Swap Character: Hold W
Special: SPACE

Tips

  • Time is slowed down by 1000% when switching characters
  • Though time may be slowed down, the clock is not. move fast!
Scriptline Jam 1

This game was made for the first Scriptline Jam.
Theme: Technology from the Future
Duration: 1 Week
